omeglespy-z-desktop release notes

2.0.0-BETA

First release to use the omeglespy-z-core application framework. This release brings the following improvements:

  • Swaps can occur for either stranger even after one disconnects.
  • Improved recaptcha avoidance.
  • Keyboard shortcuts for common tasks.
  • Expert mode.
  • Phrase filtering (inspired by the endless parade of omegle spam bots).
  • Various bug fixes.

1.8.14

Initial release. Using code based off of the now defunct https://code.google.com/p/omegle-spy/ and the 1.8 release of https://code.google.com/p/omeglespyx/.

Made the following changes:

  • Improved overall application efficiency by explicitly closing the Closeables opened in the network communication methods.
  • Added an experimental OCR implementation for the recaptchas (it didn't work well, so don't get excited).
  • Fixed the endless loop bug associated with Stranger swapping.
